Traits.Name: Sturdy
Traits.Description: Immune to shove, daze, and stun.

Traits.Name: Beastmaster
Traits.Description: The Wrangler starts combat with 3 trained beasts, which are size 1 summons (with 20 hp). Place them within range 3 of them. Each beast has a different ability (detailed in the Sic attack).

Interrupts.Name: Fierce Loyalty
Interrupts.Trigger: The Wrangler or one of its summons adjacent to them is targeted by an ability or attack.
Interrupts.Effect: The attack or ability is retargeted to either the Wrangler or the summon (Wrangler chooses which).

Actions.Name: Diaga
Actions.Description: An ally in range 4 can save, ending a mark, status, or blight on a successful save. If that ally is bloodied, they also gain vigor 1.

Actions.Name: Crack the Whip
Actions.Description: The Wrangler shoves all summons (hostile and allied) in range 3 3 spaces.

Actions.Name: Disarm
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 must save or become pacified.

Actions.Name: Sic
Actions.Description:
The Wrangler activates one of its beast summons, from the following list. If it's bloodied, it can activate all three. It must activate a different summon from the last each turn. 
- Goshawk: Flying, dodge. Can fly 3, then Attack (Piercing melee): Line 4. On hit: [D] +fray. Miss or area effect: Fray. 
- Gorebeast: Sturdy. Attack (melee): On hit: [D]+fray. Miss: Fray. Effect: Shove 2. Collide: [D] and stunned. The beast may dash 2 before making this attack. 
- Spitter: Aetherwall. May move 2, then Attack (ranged 8): On hit: Fray damage 3 times. Miss: Fray damage. Effect: Foe is poisoned and must save or lose all vigor.
